item.title: Pruning / tree maintainence required, 13th July
item.description:
People have already reported the fallen branch from this tree on the cowper road side of the park - I am adding a supplemental request that the entire tree is inspected and pruned. It looks to be dying / dead with many branches sagging and potentially dangerous. Please don't just remove the branch that has fallen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowper Close, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uncut shrubs blocking pavement., 13th July
item.description:
The bushes in this front garden have never been pruned. It makes it particularly worse because they are now very close to the dropped kerb for pedestrians and making it awkward.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gardenia Road, Bickley, London

item.title: Large Euro bin on public doorway, 13th July
item.description:
There is a large euro bin that belongs to Papa John Pizza which is being left on a public footway in Kelvin Road this is encouraging members of the public to dump rubbish and furniture on the public footway on an almost daily basis this bin needs to be secured in their premises as it was done before

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelvin Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Overgrown tree, fruit and children, 13th July
item.description:
The plum tree overhanging our house from Daubeney Fields has plums dropping into our garden. these then ferment and cause flies in the back garden. The children are slipping on the fruit and are unable to play in the garden at the moment. Please cut back

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Daubeney Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
